name: Space Floaters 2D
description: Space Floater 2D is an endless space cruising game that takes you on an adventure through the vast reaches of the universe. In this game, you control a spaceship as it floats through the cosmos, collecting valuable resources and avoiding obstacles along the way. The simple, yet addictive gameplay and beautifully rendered 2D graphics make for a captivating gaming experience. The game features an endless level design, providing players with an infinite amount of space to explore and challenging obstacles to overcome. With intuitive controls and a dynamic soundtrack, Space Floater 2D will keep you engaged for hours on end. So strap in and get ready to blast off on a journey through the endless depths of space with Space Floater 2D....
